United States Court of Appeals
                    For the First Circuit
                     ____________________

No. 01-1850


                  UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                          Appellee,

                              v.

                       ANTHONY CASTRO,

                    Defendant, Appellant.

                     ____________________

                        ERRATA SHEET

          The opinion of this court, issued February 4, 2002,
should be amended as follows:

          On page 3, line 19, insert the word "to" before the
word "find"
